input.sentences: i went for a quick walk down the street one day .
there were a lot of ponds in people 's yards .
when i got to the bridge i decided to walk over it .
there was a beautiful building on the other side .
after being out for an hour i went back home .
output.sentences: It was dusk and getting chllly as we headed home, noting the graffiti on the curb.
The sky was an icy blue and the trees and ponds and parks were empty of birds and people as we passed them by.
The bridge in the distance looked quite lonely.
We passed a beautiful building, looking like a regal and graceful swan by the water.
The shadows were lengthening by the hour as we at last entered the street that went past the still lovely flowering bushes, the one that would lead us to our gate and home.
